config.title: Mercurial Configuration
config.showRevisionInIdHelpText: Show revision as part of the node id.
config.enableHttpPostArgsHelpText: Enables the experimental HttpPostArgs Protocol of mercurial. The HttpPostArgs Protocol uses the body of post requests to send the meta information instead of http headers. This helps to reduce the header size of mercurial requests. HttpPostArgs is supported since mercurial 3.8.
config.disabledHelpText: Enable or disable the Mercurial plugin.

*.description: May change the Mercurial configuration for repositories

hg.description: May change the Mercurial configuration for this repository
